citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:07 AM on
19-JAN-17.
Arrived onsite and contacted the licensee by phone. He stated that he was out of town. There was no one present
who could assist with an inspection.
